GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.Description: Get a Coupon_ID, valid for Tbcoupon_promotion table
GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.SQL: select coupon_id from tbcoupon_promotion where ctdb_cre_datetime = (select Max(ctdb_cre_datetime) from tbcoupon_promotion) and rownum<2

Amdocs.Ginger.Repository.ActInputValue.StoreToVariable: select coupon_id from tbcoupon_promotion where ctdb_cre_datetime = (select Max(ctdb_cre_datetime) from tbcoupon_promotion) and rownum<2
Amdocs.Ginger.Repository.ActInputValue.Value: select coupon_id from tbcoupon_promotion where ctdb_cre_datetime = (select Max(ctdb_cre_datetime) from tbcoupon_promotion) and rownum<2

GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.SQL: select BUNDLE_PROMO_ID from tbquota_limits where quota_id in (select quota_id from tbquota_account) and rownum<2

Amdocs.Ginger.Repository.ActInputValue.StoreToVariable: select BUNDLE_PROMO_ID from tbquota_limits where quota_id in (select quota_id from tbquota_account) and rownum<2
Amdocs.Ginger.Repository.ActInputValue.Value: select BUNDLE_PROMO_ID from tbquota_limits where quota_id in (select quota_id from tbquota_account) and rownum<2

Amdocs.Ginger.Repository.ActInputValue.Value: select step_instance_id from tbmessage where rownum<2
